mapper.select: SELECT a.*, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `prize` p WHERE a.id = p.ana_id AND p.user_id = #{userId}) AS isPrize, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `collect` c WHERE a.id = c.ana_id AND c.user_id = #{userId}) AS isCollect FROM `ana` a WHERE a.id = #{anaId}

SELECT a.*, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `prize` p WHERE a.id = p.ana_id AND p.user_id = #{userId}) AS isPrize, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `collect` c WHERE a.id = c.ana_id AND c.user_id = #{userId}) AS isCollect FROM `ana` a
a.ana_type_id = #{anaTypeId}
and (a.ana_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') OR a.ana_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') OR a.ana_from LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') )
ORDER BY a.`create_date` DESC,a.`id` DESC

SELECT a.*, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `prize` p WHERE a.id = p.ana_id AND p.user_id = #{userId}) AS isPrize, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `collect` c WHERE a.id = c.ana_id AND c.user_id = #{userId}) AS isCollect FROM `ana` a WHERE id < #{anaId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT a.*, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `prize` p WHERE a.id = p.ana_id AND p.user_id = #{userId}) AS isPrize, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `collect` c WHERE a.id = c.ana_id AND c.user_id = #{userId}) AS isCollect FROM `ana` a WHERE id > #{anaId} ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0,1
